```{r}
library(readr); library(dplyr); library(lubridate); library(drake)
dataExample <- read_csv("https://apiservice.mol.gov.tw/OdService/download/A17000000J-020067-bVl")


```

```{r}
dataExample = {
  dataExample %>%
  mutate(
    受僱員工人數=as.numeric(受僱員工人數)
  )
  }

```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

plot1={dataExample %>%
  ggplot()+
  geom_col(
    aes(x=職類別, y=受僱員工人數)
  )}
```
